modShortDescription: This mod adds the advanced forge. Does not require any fuel. Does not attract screamers. 3 Slots for smelting.
modDescription:
This mod adds the advanced forge.

## Features

* Does not require any fuel
* Does not attract screamers
* 3 [Slots](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/) for smelting

## Changelog

**Version 2.0**

* Added new forge model
* Added 3 Slots for smelting

**Note:** This mod needs to be installed on both client and server for multiplayer.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1F14zWfPkrgJt_qjVEHErEmdGOVgHekVg/view?usp=sharing)** from Google Drive  
**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/im17wun7hflkd9m/AdvancedForge2.0.zip/file)** from MediaFire
